EmailTemplate.subject: Discover the power of inpatient virtual nursing
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Increase your capacity for care with virtual nursing The current nursing shortage is making it even harder for hospitals and health systems to deliver timely, cost-effective care. Meanwhile, virtual nursing programs are gaining momentum as they prove their value—helping alleviate staffing shortages and increase response times. Is your organization ready to transform its inpatient care delivery? Learn more about the practice of virtual nursing, get an overview of its benefits and emerging use cases and find guidance on how to introduce the practice in a way that fosters acceptance among your staff. *according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
